pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, November 12, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Paris, France

8:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Mayor of Paris Anne Hidalgo.

Office of the Mayor, Second Floor
City Hall
Place de l'Hôtel de Ville

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion with Chief Executive Officer of PUBLIC Daniel Korski at the GovTech Summit.

Salles des Fêtes, Second Floor
City Hall
Place de l'Hôtel de Ville

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Embassy of Canada
130 rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Singapore.

Closed to media.
